DOC.detailed_description: Graves'ophthalmopathy ( GO ) , also call thyroid-associated ophthalmopathy , often mild self-limiting , probably decline frequency , 3-5 % case pose threat eyesight , remain pathogenetic enigma therapeutic dilemma . In nonsevere expression , symptom sign include Photophobia , Foreign body sensation , Eyelid retraction , increase intraocular pressure , Lagophthalmos , Mild diplopia . In severe expression , disfigure invalidate disease optic nerve damage . However , study , want find retinal vessel affect early stage disease observe oxygen saturation retinal vessel compare normal people .
